page.title: 07CHILDRENS GAMES.
page.content: Last One Up. At the moment the most popular game in our school. {Rules} When we are playing 'Last One Up'you are not allowed to go outside of the gates. You play the game like this: There is some one 'on it' in the middle of the playground and you can run up and down but if you get touched you must be 'on it'.When everybody is on it someone can call {"Last one up {top's on it".}Some people call this game British Bulldog. {Some of the games we play.} Spring...Football,Sticky Glue. Summer...Rounders,Cricket. Autumn...Sticky Glue, Football. Winter...Snowball Fights,Computers.
